26#ifdef swap
27 #undef swap
28#endif
29template<class T>
30inline void swap(T &a, T &b)
31{
32 T t = a;
33 a = b;
34 b = t;
35}
36#ifdef max
37 #undef max
38#endif
39#ifdef min
40 #undef min
41#endif
42template<class T>
43inline T max(T a, T b)
44{
45 return a > b ? a : b;
46}
47template<class T>
48inline T max(T a, T b, T c)
49{
50 return max(max(a, b), c);
51}
52template<class T>
53inline T min(T a, T b)
54{
55 return a < b ? a : b;
56}
57template<class T>
58inline T min(T a, T b, T c)
59{
60 return min(min(a, b), c);
61}

63#ifdef __GNUC__
64 #define BITSCAN(mask) (__builtin_ffs(mask)-1)
65#else
66 #ifdef WIN32
67 #pragma intrinsic(_BitScanForward)
68 inline int BITSCAN(uint mask)
69 {
70 ulong i;
71 return _BitScanForward(&i, mask) ? i : -1;
72 }
73 #else
74 inline int BITSCAN(uint mask)
75 {
76 if(!mask) return -1;
77 int i = 1;
78 if(!(mask&0xFFFF)) { i += 16; mask >>= 16; }
79 if(!(mask&0xFF)) { i += 8; mask >>= 8; }
80 if(!(mask&0xF)) { i += 4; mask >>= 4; }
81 if(!(mask&3)) { i += 2; mask >>= 2; }
82 return i - (mask&1);
83 }
84 #endif
85#endif

87inline int randomint(int x)
88{
89 return rand()%(x);
90}
91inline float randomfloat(int x)
92{
93 return (float((rand()*float(x))/float(RAND_MAX)));
94}
95//1103515245+12345 are magic constants for LCG psuedorandom generator
96inline float detrnd(uint s, int x)
97{
98 return static_cast<int>(((s*1103515245+12345)>>16)%x);
99}

144inline void vformatstring(char *d, const char *fmt, va_list v, int len) { _vsnprintf(d, len, fmt, v); d[len-1] = 0; }
145
146template<size_t N>
147inline void vformatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, va_list v) { vformatstring(d, fmt, v, N); }
148
149inline char *copystring(char *d, const char *s, size_t len)
150{
151 size_t slen = min(strlen(s), len-1);
152 memcpy(d, s, slen);
153 d[slen] = 0;
154 return d;
155}
156template<size_t N>
157inline char *copystring(char (&d)[N], const char *s) { return copystring(d, s, N); }
158
159inline char *concatstring(char *d, const char *s, size_t len) { size_t used = strlen(d); return used < len ? copystring(d+used, s, len-used) : d; }

161template<size_t N>
162inline char *concatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *s) { return concatstring(d, s, N); }

164inline void nformatstring(char *d, int len, const char *fmt, ...) PRINTFARGS(3, 4);
165inline void nformatstring(char *d, int len, const char *fmt, ...)
166{
167 va_list v;
168 va_start(v, fmt);
169 vformatstring(d, fmt, v, len);
170 va_end(v);
171}

174inline void formatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, ...) PRINTFARGS(2, 3);

176template<size_t N>
177inline void formatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, ...)
178{
179 va_list v;
180 va_start(v, fmt);
181 vformatstring(d, fmt, v, static_cast<int>(N));
182 va_end(v);
183}

185template<size_t N>
186inline void concformatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, ...) PRINTFARGS(2, 3);

188template<size_t N>
189inline void concformatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, ...)
190{
191 va_list v;
192 va_start(v, fmt);
193 int len = strlen(d);
194 vformatstring(d + len, fmt, v, static_cast<int>(N) - len);
195 va_end(v);
196}

203template<size_t N>
204inline bool matchstring(const char *s, size_t len, const char (&d)[N])
205{
206 return len == N-1 && !memcmp(s, d, N-1);
207}
208
209inline char *newstring(size_t l)
210{
211 return new char[l+1];
212}
213inline char *newstring(const char *s, size_t l)
214{
215 return copystring(newstring(l), s, l+1);
216}
217inline char *newstring(const char *s)
218{
219 size_t l = strlen(s);
220 char *d = newstring(l);
221 memcpy(d, s, l+1);
222 return d;
223}
224
225inline char *newconcatstring(const char *s, const char *t)
226{
227 size_t slen = strlen(s),
228 tlen = strlen(t);
229 char *r = newstring(slen + tlen);
230 memcpy(r, s, slen);
231 memcpy(&r[slen], t, tlen);
232 r[slen+tlen] = '\0';
233 return r;
234}

236template <class T>
237struct databuf
238{
239 enum
240 {
241 OVERREAD = 1<<0,
242 OVERWROTE = 1<<1
243 };
244
245 T *buf;
246 int len, maxlen;
247 uchar flags;
248
249 databuf() : buf(nullptr), len(0), maxlen(0), flags(0) {}
250
251 template<class U>
252 databuf(T *buf, U maxlen) : buf(buf), len(0), maxlen((int)maxlen), flags(0) {}
253
254 void reset()
255 {
256 len = 0;
257 flags = 0;
258 }
259
260 void reset(T *buf_, int maxlen_)
261 {
262 reset();
263 buf = buf_;
264 maxlen = maxlen_;
265 }
266
267 const T &get()
268 {
269 static const T overreadval = 0;
270 if(len<maxlen)
271 {
272 return buf[len++];
273 }
274 flags |= OVERREAD;
275 return overreadval;
276 }
277
291 databuf subbuf(int sz)
292 {
293 sz = std::clamp(sz, 0, maxlen-len);
294 len += sz;
295 return databuf(&buf[len-sz], sz);
296 }
297
308 T *pad(int numvals)
309 {
310 T *vals = &buf[len];
311 len += min(numvals, maxlen-len);
312 return vals;
313 }
314
322 void put(const T &val)
323 {
324 if(len<maxlen)
325 {
326 buf[len++] = val;
327 }
328 else
329 {
330 flags |= OVERWROTE;
331 }
332 }
333
334 void put(const T *vals, int numvals)
335 {
336 if(maxlen - len < numvals)
337 {
338 numvals = maxlen - len;
339 flags |= OVERWROTE;
340 }
341 memcpy(&buf[len], (const void *)vals, numvals*sizeof(T));
342 len += numvals;
343 }
344
345 int get(T *vals, int numvals)
346 {
347 if(maxlen - len < numvals)
348 {
349 numvals = maxlen - len;
350 flags |= OVERREAD;
351 }
352 memcpy(vals, (void *)&buf[len], numvals*sizeof(T));
353 len += numvals;
354 return numvals;
355 }
356
357 void offset(int n)
358 {
359 n = min(n, maxlen);
360 buf += n;
361 maxlen -= n;
362 len = max(len-n, 0);
363 }
364
373 T *getbuf() const { return buf; }
374
381 bool empty() const { return len==0; }
382
391 int length() const { return len; }
392
402 int remaining() const { return maxlen-len; }
403
414 bool overread() const { return (flags&OVERREAD)!=0; }
415
425 bool overwrote() const { return (flags&OVERWROTE)!=0; }
426
427 bool check(int n) { return remaining() >= n; }
428
429 void forceoverread()
430 {
431 len = maxlen;
432 flags |= OVERREAD;
433 }
434};

437typedef databuf<uchar> ucharbuf;

442struct sortless
443{
444 template<class T>
445 bool operator()(const T &x, const T &y) const { return x < y; }
446
447 bool operator()(char *x, char *y) const { return strcmp(x, y) < 0; }
448
449 bool operator()(const char *x, const char *y) const { return strcmp(x, y) < 0; }
450};
451
452struct sortnameless
453{
454 template<class T>
455 bool operator()(const T &x, const T &y) const { return sortless()(x.name, y.name); }
456
457 template<class T>
458 bool operator()(T *x, T *y) const { return sortless()(x->name, y->name); }
459
460 template<class T>
461 bool operator()(const T *x, const T *y) const { return sortless()(x->name, y->name); }
462};

478template<class T, class F>
479inline void insertionsort(T *start, T *end, F fun)
480{
481 for(T *i = start+1; i < end; i++)
482 {
483 if(fun(*i, i[-1]))
484 {
485 T tmp = *i;
486 *i = i[-1];
487 T *j = i-1;
488 for(; j > start && fun(tmp, j[-1]); --j)
489 {
490 *j = j[-1];
491 }
492 *j = tmp;
493 }
494 }
495
496}
497
498template<class T, class F>
499inline void insertionsort(T *buf, int n, F fun)
500{
501 insertionsort(buf, buf+n, fun);
502}
503
504template<class T>
505inline void insertionsort(T *buf, int n)
506{
507 insertionsort(buf, buf+n, sortless());
508}
509
524template<class T, class F>
525inline void quicksort(T *start, T *end, F fun)
526{
527 while(end-start > 10)
528 {
529 T *mid = &start[(end-start)/2], *i = start+1,
530 *j = end-2,
531 pivot;
532 if(fun(*start, *mid)) /* start < mid */
533 {
534 if(fun(end[-1], *start))
535 {
536 pivot = *start;
537 *start = end[-1];
538 end[-1] = *mid;
539 } /* end < start < mid */
540 else if(fun(end[-1], *mid))
541 {
542 pivot = end[-1];
543 end[-1] = *mid;
544 } /* start <= end < mid */
545 else
546 {
547 pivot = *mid;
548 } /* start < mid <= end */
549 }
550 else if(fun(*start, end[-1]))
551 {
552 pivot = *start;
553 *start = *mid;
554 } /*mid <= start < end */
555 else if(fun(*mid, end[-1]))
556 {
557 pivot = end[-1];
558 end[-1] = *start;
559 *start = *mid;
560 } /* mid < end <= start */
561 else
562 {
563 pivot = *mid;
564 swap(*start, end[-1]);
565 } /* end <= mid <= start */
566 *mid = end[-2];
567 do
568 {
569 while(fun(*i, pivot))
570 {
571 if(++i >= j)
572 {
573 goto partitioned;
574 }
575 }
576 while(fun(pivot, *--j))
577 {
578 if(i >= j)
579 {
580 goto partitioned;
581 }
582 }
583 swap(*i, *j);
584 } while(++i < j);
585 partitioned:
586 end[-2] = *i;
587 *i = pivot;
588
589 if(i-start < end-(i+1))
590 {
591 quicksort(start, i, fun);
592 start = i+1;
593 }
594 else
595 {
596 quicksort(i+1, end, fun);
597 end = i;
598 }
599 }
600
601 insertionsort(start, end, fun);
602}
603
604template<class T, class F>
605inline void quicksort(T *buf, int n, F fun)
606{
607 quicksort(buf, buf+n, fun);
608}
609
610template<class T>
611inline void quicksort(T *buf, int n)
612{
613 quicksort(buf, buf+n, sortless());
614}

616inline uint hthash(const char *key)
617{
618 uint h = 5381;
619 for(int i = 0, k; (k = key[i]); i++)
620 {
621 h = ((h<<5)+h)^k; // bernstein k=33 xor
622 }
623 return h;
624}
625
626inline bool htcmp(const char *x, const char *y)
627{
628 return !strcmp(x, y);
629}

631struct stringslice
632{
633 const char *str;
634 int len;
635 stringslice() {}
636 stringslice(const char *str, int len) : str(str), len(len) {}
637 stringslice(const char *str, const char *end) : str(str), len(static_cast<int>(end-str)) {}
638
639 const char *end() const { return &str[len]; }
640};
641
642inline char *newstring(const stringslice &s) { return newstring(s.str, s.len); }
643inline const char *stringptr(const char *s) { return s; }
644inline const char *stringptr(const stringslice &s) { return s.str; }
645inline int stringlen(const char *s) { return static_cast<int>(strlen(s)); }
646inline int stringlen(const stringslice &s) { return s.len; }
647
648inline char *copystring(char *d, const stringslice &s, size_t len)
649{
650 size_t slen = min(size_t(s.len), len-1);
651 memcpy(d, s.str, slen);
652 d[slen] = 0;
653 return d;
654}
655
656template<size_t N>
657inline char *copystring(char (&d)[N], const stringslice &s) { return copystring(d, s, N); }
658
659inline uint memhash(const void *ptr, int len)
660{
661 const uchar *data = (const uchar *)ptr;
662 uint h = 5381;
663 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(len); ++i)
664 {
665 h = ((h<<5)+h)^data[i];
666 }
667 return h;
668}
669
670inline uint hthash(const stringslice &s) { return memhash(s.str, s.len); }
671
672inline bool htcmp(const stringslice &x, const char *y)
673{
674 return x.len == (int)strlen(y) && !memcmp(x.str, y, x.len);
675}
676
677inline uint hthash(int key)
678{
679 return key;
680}
681
682inline bool htcmp(int x, int y)
683{
684 return x==y;
685}
686
687inline uint hthash(GLuint key)
688{
689 return key;
690}
691
692inline bool htcmp(GLuint x, GLuint y)
693{
694 return x==y;
695}

711template <class T>
712struct vector
713{
714 static const int MINSIZE = 8;
716 T *buf;
717 int alen,
718 ulen;
726 vector() : buf(nullptr), alen(0), ulen(0)
727 {
728 }
729
738 vector(const vector &v) : buf(nullptr), alen(0), ulen(0)
739 {
740 *this = v;
741 }
742
749 ~vector() { shrink(0); if(buf) delete[] (uchar *)buf; }
750
762 vector<T> &operator=(const vector<T> &v)
763 {
764 shrink(0);
765 if(v.length() > alen)
766 {
767 growbuf(v.length());
768 }
769 for(int i = 0; i < v.length(); i++)
770 {
771 add(v[i]);
772 }
773 return *this;
774 }
775
793 T &add(const T &x)
794 {
795 if(ulen==alen)
796 {
797 growbuf(ulen+1);
798 }
799 new (&buf[ulen]) T(x);
800 return buf[ulen++];
801 }
802
819 T &add()
820 {
821 if(ulen==alen)
822 {
823 growbuf(ulen+1);
824 }
825 new (&buf[ulen]) T;
826 return buf[ulen++];
827 }
828
838 T &dup()
839 {
840 if(ulen==alen)
841 {
842 growbuf(ulen+1);
843 }
844 new (&buf[ulen]) T(buf[ulen-1]);
845 return buf[ulen++];
846 }
847
856 void move(vector<T> &v)
857 {
858 if(!ulen)
859 {
860 swap(buf, v.buf);
861 swap(ulen, v.ulen);
862 swap(alen, v.alen);
863 }
864 else
865 {
866 growbuf(ulen+v.ulen);
867 if(v.ulen)
868 {
869 memcpy(&buf[ulen], (void *)v.buf, v.ulen*sizeof(T));
870 }
871 ulen += v.ulen;
872 v.ulen = 0;
873 }
874 }

889 bool inrange(size_t i) const { return i<size_t(ulen); }
890
904 bool inrange(int i) const { return i>=0 && i<ulen; }
905
914 T &pop() { return buf[--ulen]; }
915
923 T &last() { return buf[ulen-1]; }
924
934 void drop() { ulen--; buf[ulen].~T(); }
935
947 bool empty() const { return ulen==0; }
948
960 int capacity() const { return alen; }
961
970 int length() const { return ulen; }
971
982 T &operator[](int i) { return buf[i]; }
983
994 const T &operator[](int i) const { return buf[i]; }
995
1006 T *disown() { T *r = buf; buf = nullptr; alen = ulen = 0; return r; }
1007
1016 void shrink(int i)
1017 {
1018 if(!std::is_class<T>::value)
1019 {
1020 ulen = i;
1021 }
1022 else
1023 {
1024 while(ulen>i)
1025 {
1026 drop();
1027 }
1028 }
1029 }
1030
1037 void setsize(int i) { ulen = i; }
1038
1048 void deletecontents(int n = 0)
1049 {
1050 while(ulen > n)
1051 {
1052 delete pop();
1053 }
1054 }
1055
1065 void deletearrays(int n = 0)
1066 {
1067 while(ulen > n)
1068 {
1069 delete[] pop();
1070 }
1071 }

1092 const T *getbuf() const { return buf; }

1106 bool inbuf(const T *e) const { return e >= buf && e < &buf[ulen]; }

1119 template<class F>
1120 void sort(F fun, int i = 0, int n = -1)
1121 {
1122 quicksort(&buf[i], n < 0 ? ulen-i : n, fun);
1123 }
1124
1135 void sort() { sort(sortless()); }
1136
1149 void sortname() { sort(sortnameless()); }
1150
1160 void growbuf(int sz)
1161 {
1162 int olen = alen;
1163 if(alen <= 0)
1164 {
1165 alen = max(MINSIZE, sz);
1166 }
1167 else
1168 {
1169 while(alen < sz)
1170 {
1171 alen += alen/2;
1172 }
1173 }
1174 if(alen <= olen)
1175 {
1176 return;
1177 }
1178 uchar *newbuf = new uchar[alen*sizeof(T)];
1179 if(olen > 0)
1180 {
1181 if(ulen > 0)
1182 {
1183 memcpy(newbuf, (void *)buf, ulen*sizeof(T));
1184 }
1185 delete[] (uchar *)buf;
1186 }
1187 buf = (T *)newbuf;
1188 }
1189
1199 databuf<T> reserve(int sz)
1200 {
1201 if(alen-ulen < sz)
1202 {
1203 growbuf(ulen+sz);
1204 }
1205 return databuf<T>(&buf[ulen], sz);
1206 }
1207
1213 void advance(int sz)
1214 {
1215 ulen += sz;
1216 }
1217
1223 void addbuf(const databuf<T> &p)
1224 {
1225 advance(p.length());
1226 }
1227
1236 T *pad(int n)
1237 {
1238 T *buf = reserve(n).buf;
1239 advance(n);
1240 return buf;
1241 }
1242
1252 void put(const T &v) { add(v); }
1253
1260 void put(const T *v, int n)
1261 {
1262 databuf<T> buf = reserve(n);
1263 buf.put(v, n);
1264 addbuf(buf);
1265 }

1277 void remove(int i, int n)
1278 {
1279 for(int p = i+n; p<ulen; p++)
1280 {
1281 buf[p-n] = buf[p];
1282 }
1283 ulen -= n;
1284 }
1285
1301 T remove(int i)
1302 {
1303 T e = buf[i];
1304 for(int p = i+1; p<ulen; p++)
1305 {
1306 buf[p-1] = buf[p];
1307 }
1308 ulen--;
1309 return e;
1310 }
1311
1323 T removeunordered(int i)
1324 {
1325 T e = buf[i];
1326 ulen--;
1327 if(ulen>0)
1328 {
1329 buf[i] = buf[ulen];
1330 }
1331 return e;
1332 }

1344 template<class U>
1345 int find(const U &o)
1346 {
1347 for(int i = 0; i < ulen; ++i)
1348 {
1349 if(buf[i]==o)
1350 {
1351 return i;
1352 }
1353 }
1354 return -1;
1355 }
1356
1366 void addunique(const T &o)
1367 {
1368 if(find(o) < 0)
1369 {
1370 add(o);
1371 }
1372 }
1373
1383 void removeobj(const T &o)
1384 {
1385 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(ulen); ++i)
1386 {
1387 if(buf[i] == o)
1388 {
1389 int dst = i;
1390 for(int j = i+1; j < ulen; j++)
1391 {
1392 if(!(buf[j] == o))
1393 {
1394 buf[dst++] = buf[j];
1395 }
1396 }
1397 setsize(dst);
1398 break;
1399 }
1400 }
1401 }
1402
1416 void replacewithlast(const T &o)
1417 {
1418 if(!ulen) //do not operate on empty vector
1419 {
1420 return;
1421 }
1422 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(ulen-1); ++i) //loop through
1423 {
1424 if(buf[i]==o) //compare to passed item
1425 {
1426 buf[i] = buf[ulen-1]; //move last element
1427 break;
1428 }
1429 ulen--; //move index down one
1430 }
1431 }
1432
1446 T &insert(int i, const T &e)
1447 {
1448 add(T()); //add to end of vector
1449 for(int p = ulen-1; p>i; p--) //from end to index, shift elements forwards one
1450 {
1451 buf[p] = buf[p-1];
1452 }
1453 buf[i] = e; //insert at ith location in buffer
1454 return buf[i]; //return the value assigned
1455 }
1456
1469 T *insert(int i, const T *e, int n)
1470 {
1471 if(alen-ulen < n) //expand buffer if needed
1472 {
1473 growbuf(ulen+n);
1474 }
1475 for(int j = 0; j < n; ++j) //add n elements to end
1476 {
1477 add(T());
1478 }
1479 for(int p = ulen-1; p>=i+n; p--) //for descending elements after i+n (new elements) move upwards by n
1480 {
1481 buf[p] = buf[p-n];
1482 }
1483 for(int j = 0; j < n; ++j) //set value of n elements to e
1484 {
1485 buf[i+j] = e[j];
1486 }
1487 return &buf[i]; //return first newly allocated
1488 }
1489
1496 void reverse()
1497 {
1498 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(ulen/2); ++i)
1499 {
1500 swap(buf[i], buf[ulen-1-i]);
1501 }
1502 }
1503
1512 static int heapparent(int i) { return (i - 1) >> 1; }
1513
1524 static int heapchild(int i) { return (i << 1) + 1; }
1525
1529 void buildheap()
1530 {
1531 for(int i = ulen/2; i >= 0; i--) downheap(i);
1532 }
1533
1544 int upheap(int i)
1545 {
1546 float score = heapscore(buf[i]);
1547 while(i > 0)
1548 {
1549 int pi = heapparent(i);
1550 if(score >= heapscore(buf[pi]))
1551 {
1552 break;
1553 }
1554 swap(buf[i], buf[pi]);
1555 i = pi;
1556 }
1557 return i;
1558 }
1559
1568 T &addheap(const T &x)
1569 {
1570 add(x);
1571 return buf[upheap(ulen-1)];
1572 }
1573
1583 int downheap(int i)
1584 {
1585 float score = heapscore(buf[i]);
1586 for(;;)
1587 {
1588 int ci = heapchild(i);
1589 if(ci >= ulen)
1590 {
1591 break;
1592 }
1593 float cscore = heapscore(buf[ci]);
1594 if(score > cscore)
1595 {
1596 if(ci+1 < ulen && heapscore(buf[ci+1]) < cscore)
1597 {
1598 swap(buf[ci+1], buf[i]); i = ci+1;
1599 }
1600 else
1601 {
1602 swap(buf[ci], buf[i]); i = ci;
1603 }
1604 }
1605 else if(ci+1 < ulen && heapscore(buf[ci+1]) < score)
1606 {
1607 swap(buf[ci+1], buf[i]); i = ci+1;
1608 }
1609 else break;
1610 }
1611 return i;
1612 }
1613
1622 T removeheap()
1623 {
1624 T e = removeunordered(0);
1625 if(ulen)
1626 {
1627 downheap(0);
1628 }
1629 return e;
1630 }
1631
1645 template<class K>
1646 int htfind(const K &key)
1647 {
1648 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(ulen); ++i)
1649 {
1650 if(htcmp(key, buf[i]))
1651 {
1652 return i;
1653 }
1654 }
1655 return -1;
1656 }
1657
1658 #define UNIQUE(overwrite, cleanup) \
1659 for(int i = 1; i < ulen; i++) \
1660 if(htcmp(buf[i-1], buf[i])) \
1661 { \
1662 int n = i; \
1663 while(++i < ulen) \
1664 { \
1665 if(!htcmp(buf[n-1], buf[i])) \
1666 { \
1667 overwrite; \
1668 n++; \
1669 } \
1670 } \
1671 cleanup; \
1672 break; \
1673 }
1674
1685 void unique() // contents must be initially sorted
1686 {
1687 UNIQUE(buf[n] = buf[i], setsize(n));
1688 }
1689
1697 void uniquedeletecontents()
1698 {
1699 UNIQUE(swap(buf[n], buf[i]), deletecontents(n));
1700 }
1701
1709 void uniquedeletearrays()
1710 {
1711 UNIQUE(swap(buf[n], buf[i]), deletearrays(n));
1712 }
1713 #undef UNIQUE
1714};
1715
1732template<class H, class E, class K, class T>
1733struct hashbase
1734{
1735 typedef E elemtype;
1736 typedef K keytype;
1737 typedef T datatype;
1738
1739 enum { CHUNKSIZE = 64 };
1740
1744 struct chain { E elem; chain *next; };
1745
1749 struct chainchunk { chain chains[CHUNKSIZE]; chainchunk *next; };
1750
1751 int size;
1752 int numelems;
1753 chain **chains;
1755 chainchunk *chunks;
1756 chain *unused;
1757
1758 enum { DEFAULTSIZE = 1<<10 }; //2^10 = 1024*(8) = 8192 bytes before allocation
1759
1760 hashbase(int size = DEFAULTSIZE)
1761 : size(size)
1762 {
1763 numelems = 0; //no elements assigned by default
1764 chunks = nullptr; //no chunks assigned
1765 unused = nullptr;
1766 chains = new chain *[size]; //the base array of chains: an array of 1024 pointers at default size
1767 memset(chains, 0, size*sizeof(chain *)); //clear all values inside the array to 0
1768 }
1769
1770 ~hashbase()
1771 {
1772 delete[] chains; //free the 1024 entry (by default) base array
1773 chains = nullptr;
1774 deletechunks();
1775 }
1776
1784 chain *insert(uint h)
1785 {
1786
1787 if(!unused)
1788 {
1789 chainchunk *chunk = new chainchunk;
1790 chunk->next = chunks;
1791 chunks = chunk;
1792 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(CHUNKSIZE-1); ++i)
1793 {
1794 chunk->chains[i].next = &chunk->chains[i+1];
1795 }
1796 chunk->chains[CHUNKSIZE-1].next = unused;
1797 unused = chunk->chains;
1798 }
1799 chain *c = unused;
1800 unused = unused->next;
1801 c->next = chains[h];
1802 chains[h] = c;
1803 numelems++;
1804 return c;
1805 }
1806
1807 template<class U>
1808 T &insert(uint h, const U &key)
1809 {
1810 chain *c = insert(h);
1811 H::setkey(c->elem, key);
1812 return H::getdata(c->elem);
1813 }
1814
1815 #define HTFIND(success, fail) \
1816 uint h = hthash(key)&(this->size-1); \
1817 for(chain *c = this->chains[h]; c; c = c->next) \
1818 { \
1819 if(htcmp(key, H::getkey(c->elem))) \
1820 { \
1821 return success H::getdata(c->elem); \
1822 } \
1823 } \
1824 return (fail);
1825
1826 template<class U>
1827 T *access(const U &key)
1828 {
1829 HTFIND(&, nullptr);
1830 }
1831
1832 template<class U, class V>
1833 T &access(const U &key, const V &elem)
1834 {
1835 HTFIND( , insert(h, key) = elem);
1836 }
1837
1838 template<class U>
1839 T &operator[](const U &key)
1840 {
1841 HTFIND( , insert(h, key));
1842 }
1843
1844 template<class U>
1845 T &find(const U &key, T &notfound)
1846 {
1847 HTFIND( , notfound);
1848 }
1849
1850 template<class U>
1851 const T &find(const U &key, const T &notfound)
1852 {
1853 HTFIND( , notfound);
1854 }
1855
1856 template<class U>
1857 bool remove(const U &key)
1858 {
1859 uint h = hthash(key)&(size-1);
1860 for(chain **p = &chains[h], *c = chains[h]; c; p = &c->next, c = c->next)
1861 {
1862 if(htcmp(key, H::getkey(c->elem)))
1863 {
1864 *p = c->next;
1865 c->elem.~E();
1866 new (&c->elem) E;
1867 c->next = unused;
1868 unused = c;
1869 numelems--;
1870 return true;
1871 }
1872 }
1873 return false;
1874 }
1875
1876 void recycle()
1877 {
1878 if(!numelems)
1879 {
1880 return;
1881 }
1882 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(size); ++i)
1883 {
1884 chain *c = chains[i];
1885 if(!c)
1886 {
1887 continue;
1888 }
1889 for(;;)
1890 {
1891 htrecycle(c->elem);
1892 if(!c->next)
1893 {
1894 break;
1895 }
1896 c = c->next;
1897 }
1898 c->next = unused;
1899 unused = chains[i];
1900 chains[i] = nullptr;
1901 }
1902 numelems = 0;
1903 }
1904
1905 void deletechunks()
1906 {
1907 for(chainchunk *nextchunk; chunks; chunks = nextchunk)
1908 {
1909 nextchunk = chunks->next;
1910 delete chunks;
1911 }
1912 }
1913
1914 void clear()
1915 {
1916 if(!numelems)
1917 {
1918 return;
1919 }
1920 memset(chains, 0, size*sizeof(chain *));
1921 numelems = 0;
1922 unused = nullptr;
1923 deletechunks();
1924 }
1925
1926 static inline chain *enumnext(void *i) { return ((chain *)i)->next; }
1927 static inline K &enumkey(void *i) { return H::getkey(((chain *)i)->elem); }
1928 static inline T &enumdata(void *i) { return H::getdata(((chain *)i)->elem); }
1929};
1930
1931template<class T>
1932inline void htrecycle(const T &) {}
1933
1934template<class T>
1935struct hashset : hashbase<hashset<T>, T, T, T>
1936{
1937 typedef hashbase<hashset<T>, T, T, T> basetype;
1938
1939 hashset(int size = basetype::DEFAULTSIZE) : basetype(size) {}
1940
1941 static inline const T &getkey(const T &elem) { return elem; }
1942 static inline T &getdata(T &elem) { return elem; }
1943 template<class K>
1944 static inline void setkey(T &, const K &) {}
1945
1946 template<class V>
1947 T &add(const V &elem)
1948 {
1949 return basetype::access(elem, elem);
1950 }
1951};
1952
1953template<class T>
1954struct hashnameset : hashbase<hashnameset<T>, T, const char *, T>
1955{
1956 typedef hashbase<hashnameset<T>, T, const char *, T> basetype;
1957
1958 hashnameset(int size = basetype::DEFAULTSIZE) : basetype(size) {}
1959
1960 template<class U>
1961 static inline const char *getkey(const U &elem) { return elem.name; }
1962
1963 template<class U>
1964 static inline const char *getkey(U *elem) { return elem->name; }
1965
1966 static inline T &getdata(T &elem) { return elem; }
1967
1968 template<class K>
1969 static inline void setkey(T &, const K &) {}
1970
1971 template<class V>
1972 T &add(const V &elem)
1973 {
1974 return basetype::access(getkey(elem), elem);
1975 }
1976};

1978template<class K, class T>
1979struct hashtableentry
1980{
1981 K key;
1982 T data;
1983};
1984
1985template<class K, class T>
1986inline void htrecycle(hashtableentry<K, T> &entry)
1987{
1988 htrecycle(entry.key);
1989 htrecycle(entry.data);
1990}

1992template<class K, class T>
1993struct hashtable : hashbase<hashtable<K, T>, hashtableentry<K, T>, K, T>
1994{
1995 typedef hashbase<hashtable<K, T>, hashtableentry<K, T>, K, T> basetype;
1996 typedef typename basetype::elemtype elemtype;
1997
1998 hashtable(int size = basetype::DEFAULTSIZE) : basetype(size) {}
1999
2000 static inline K &getkey(elemtype &elem) { return elem.key; }
2001 static inline T &getdata(elemtype &elem) { return elem.data; }
2002
2003 template<class U>
2004 static inline void setkey(elemtype &elem, const U &key) { elem.key = key; }
2005};
2006
2007//ht stands for a hash table
2008#define ENUMERATE_KT(ht,k,e,t,f,b) \
2009 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>((ht).size); ++i) \
2010 { \
2011 for(void *ec = (ht).chains[i]; ec;) \
2012 { \
2013 k &e = (ht).enumkey(ec); \
2014 t &f = (ht).enumdata(ec); \
2015 ec = (ht).enumnext(ec); \
2016 b; \
2017 } \
2018 }
2019#define ENUMERATE(ht,t,e,b) \
2020 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>((ht).size); ++i) \
2021 { \
2022 for(void *ec = (ht).chains[i]; ec;) \
2023 { \
2024 t &e = (ht).enumdata(ec); \
2025 ec = (ht).enumnext(ec); \
2026 b; \
2027 } \
2028 }

2030template<class T>
2031inline T endianswap(T n) { union { T t; uint i; } conv; conv.t = n; conv.i = SDL_Swap32(conv.i); return conv.t; }
2032
2033template<>
2034inline uint endianswap<uint>(uint n) { return SDL_Swap32(n); }
2035
2036template<>
2037inline int endianswap<int>(int n) { return SDL_Swap32(n); }

2039/* workaround for some C platforms that have these two functions as macros - not used anywhere */
2040#ifdef getchar
2041 #undef getchar
2042#endif
2043#ifdef putchar
2044 #undef putchar
2045#endif
2046
2047struct stream
2048{
2049#ifdef WIN32
2050 #if defined(__GNUC__) && !defined(__MINGW32__)
2051 typedef off64_t offset;
2052 #else
2053 typedef __int64 offset;
2054 #endif
2055 #else
2056 typedef off_t offset;
2057#endif
2058 //see file/gz/utf8/zipstream children for more interesting forms
2059 virtual ~stream() {}
2060 virtual void close() = 0;
2061 virtual bool end() = 0;
2062 virtual offset tell() { return -1; }
2063 virtual offset rawtell() { return tell(); }
2064 virtual bool seek(offset, int) { return false; }
2065 virtual offset size();
2066 virtual offset rawsize() { return size(); }
2067 virtual size_t read(void *, size_t) { return 0; }
2068 virtual size_t write(const void *, size_t) { return 0; }
2069 virtual bool flush() { return true; }
2070 virtual int getchar() { uchar c; return read(&c, 1) == 1 ? c : -1; }
2071 virtual bool putchar(int n) { uchar c = n; return write(&c, 1) == 1; }
2072 virtual bool getline(char *str, size_t len);
2073 virtual bool putstring(const char *str) { size_t len = strlen(str); return write(str, len) == len; }
2074 virtual bool putline(const char *str) { return putstring(str) && putchar('\n'); }
2075 virtual size_t printf(const char *fmt, ...) PRINTFARGS(2, 3);
2076 virtual uint getcrc() { return 0; }
2077
2078 template<class T>
2079 size_t put(const T *v, size_t n) { return write(v, n*sizeof(T))/sizeof(T); }
2080
2081 template<class T>
2082 bool put(T n) { return write(&n, sizeof(n)) == sizeof(n); }
2083
2084 template<class T>
2085 size_t get(T *v, size_t n) { return read(v, n*sizeof(T))/sizeof(T); }
2086
2087 template<class T>
2088 T get() { T n; return read(&n, sizeof(n)) == sizeof(n) ? n : 0; }
2089
2090 template<class T>
2091 bool putbig(T n) { return put<T>(endianswap(n)); }
2092
2093
2094SDL_RWops *rwops();
2095
2096};

2110template<class T>
2111inline void putint_(T &p, int n)
2112{
2113 if(n<128 && n>-127)
2114 {
2115 p.put(n);
2116 }
2117 else if(n<0x8000 && n>=-0x8000)
2118 {
2119 p.put(0x80);
2120 p.put(n);
2121 p.put(n>>8);
2122 }
2123 else
2124 {
2125 p.put(0x81);
2126 p.put(n);
2127 p.put(n>>8);
2128 p.put(n>>16);
2129 p.put(n>>24);
2130 }
2131}
2132
2133template<class T>
2134inline void putuint_(T &p, int n)
2135{
2136 if(n < 0 || n >= (1<<21))
2137 {
2138 p.put(0x80 | (n & 0x7F));
2139 p.put(0x80 | ((n >> 7) & 0x7F));
2140 p.put(0x80 | ((n >> 14) & 0x7F));
2141 p.put(n >> 21);
2142 }
2143 else if(n < (1<<7))
2144 {
2145 p.put(n);
2146 }
2147 else if(n < (1<<14))
2148 {
2149 p.put(0x80 | (n & 0x7F));
2150 p.put(n >> 7);
2151 }
2152 else
2153 {
2154 p.put(0x80 | (n & 0x7F));
2155 p.put(0x80 | ((n >> 7) & 0x7F));
2156 p.put(n >> 14);
2157 }
2158}
2159
2160
2161template<class T>
2162inline void sendstring_(const char *t, T &p)
2163{
2164 while(*t)
2165 {
2166 putint(p, *t++);
2167 }
2168 putint(p, 0);
2169}

2171template<class T>
2172inline void putfloat_(T &p, float f)
2173{
2174 p.put((uchar *)&f, sizeof(float));
2175}
